resources.string: Tianyi Pavilion is located in Haishu District, Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province. It is the earliest private library building in China. It is also the oldest library in Asia and one of the

Tianyi Pavilion covers an area of ​​26,000 square meters and was built in the middle of the Ming Dynasty. It was built by Fan Qin, the right minister of the retreat of the Ministry of War, and was declared a national key cultural relic protection unit by the State Council in 1982.
The business of our library has developed rapidly. We have added the China Local History Museum, the Yintai Official House Museum, and the Mahjong Origin Exhibition Hall.
The ground floor is wide and six in depth, with front and back corridors.
In addition, we also cut the “Tianyichi” Tongyue Lake in front of the building, which can beautify the environment and store water for fire prevention.

"The richness of the book, A is in the world", the first Tianyige China Book Culture Festival opened in 2003 shows the "cultural signboard" of the city that Ningbo people take pride in: the book culture.
The poem of Chen Fu, a poet of the Yuan Dynasty, embodies the special status of the Drum Tower in the history of our country.

At that time, Mingzhou’s thorny Hancha moved the state governor from Xiaoxi Town to Ningbo’s “Sanjiangkou”, centered on the Zhongshan Square to the Drum Tower, built the official residence, and established the Muzha as the city. Later, the city wall was built with the masonry of the great city.

In terms of traditional residential materials in Ningbo, the wood is mainly composed of local native trees such as Chinese fir and pine. The stone is also mainly composed of local bluestone and Meiyuan stone. The precious wood is rare in residential buildings.

The exterior color of the building advocates a plain and natural aesthetic view, with cold gray as the main tone, black and white as the base color, blue brick, powder wall or clear water brick wall, and tile, which is composed of black, white and gray.
Forming a cultural introduction to Ningbo Tianyi Pavilion, a simple explanation of history
While enjoying the composition of Ningbo Tianyi Pavilion, take a leisurely walk and recommend this tour.
It is possible to confirm the location of all cultural heritage and the current location.
